mapper.update: update product_orderItem set reviewReg = 'yes' where order_no = #{orderNo} and prod_code = #{prodCode}
mapper.select: select re_no, r.user_id, r.order_no, re_image, r.prod_code, prod_name, star_rating, re_content, order_date from review r JOIN product_order o ON r.user_id = o.user_id and r.order_no = o.order_no JOIN product_orderItem i ON r.prod_code = i.prod_code and r.order_no = i.order_no where r.user_id = #{id} order by re_no ASC
select * from review r JOIN product p ON r.prod_code = p.prod_code where re_no = #{reNo}
